text: Charlieville is an unincorporated community in Richland Parish, Louisiana, United States. The community is located SE of Monroe, Louisiana. ==History== Charlieville was a landing for steamboats in the 1800s on the banks of Boeuf River. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Richland Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana
title: Charlieville, Louisiana
